scripts.minify:js: uglifyjs admin/js/jquery.autocomplete.js --compress --mangle --warn --output admin/js/jquery.autocomplete.min.js && uglifyjs admin/js/multiple-search-ajax.js --compress --mangle --output admin/js/multiple-search-ajax.min.js && uglifyjs admin/js/search-ajax.js --compress --mangle --output admin/js/search-ajax.min.js && uglifyjs admin/js/wp-inci-admin.js --compress --mangle --output admin/js/wp-inci-admin.min.js
scripts.minify:css: cleancss -o admin/css/wp-inci-admin.min.css admin/css/wp-inci-admin.css && cleancss -o public/css/wp-inci.min.css public/css/wp-inci.css
scripts.watch:css: onchange 'admin/css/*.css' -- npm run minify:css && onchange 'public/css/*.css' -- npm run minify:css
scripts.build: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
